metadata.title: CVE-2021-47356 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: mISDN:fix possible use-after-free in HFC_cleanup() This module's remove pathcalls del_timer(). However, that function does not wait until the timerhandler finishes. This means that the timer handler may still be runningafter the driver's remove function has finished, which would result in ause-after-free. Fix by calling del_timer_sync(), which makes sure the timerhandler has finished, and unable to re-schedule itself.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
